body.p: Born in Breckinridge County, Kentucky in 1815. Son of Joseph Allen and Margaret Crawford Allen. Represented Breckinridge County, Kentucky, in the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1838-39. Appointed by Governor James Clark to be Commonwealth's Attorney, and served as such until 1856. Married Mary E. Jennings in 1853. Father of Horace Allen and Mary Allen. Ran unsuccessfully for Lieutenant Governor with Joshua F. Bell in 1859. Represented Breckinridge County in the he House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1861 to 1866.
